channel.title: Carson Pass on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Carson Pass on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: CA-89 South - Summit Information
item.description: Summit closure information on CA-89 south. Information for Ebbetts Pass (via CA-4), Monitor Pass (via CA-89) and Carson Pass (via CA-88). This photograph was taken in mid-June, and all of the passes are open. Carson Pass on CA-88 is the only pass that is typically opened year round.
